participant_1.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

participant_2.background: my favourite artist is travis scott. my mother is a dentist. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. i like playing basketball. i have one older sister.
